data.chText: 大气污染 / 状况 / 压力
令人激动的；使人动感情的
data.enText: creating an exciting or emotional mood

simple_means.memory_skill: atmo 空气，蒸汽 + spher 球 + ic …的 → 大气的

tr: relating to or located in the atmosphere

value.def: Atmospheric is used to describe something which relates to the earth's atmosphere.
value.tran: 大气的;大气层的;空气的

value.def: If you describe a place or a piece of music as atmospheric, you like it because it has a particular quality which is interesting or exciting and makes you feel a particular emotion.

example.ex: One of the most atmospheric corners of Prague is the old Jewish ghetto.
example.tran: 古老的犹太人社区是布拉格最具特色的角落之一。

value.tran: （地方、音乐等）有情调的，有魅力的，有感染力的

rootsaffixes.indicate: = air, vapor 空气, 蒸汽
rootsaffixes.title: atmo

partsOfSpeech.dec: atmo 空气，蒸汽 + s → 大气，空气
atmo 空气，蒸汽 + spher 球 + e → 围绕地球的空气 → 大气层
atmo 空气，蒸汽 + spher 球 + ic …的 → 大气的
